about_the_game:
Meet the new addition for Cast Cats, which will immerse you in the atmosphere of heroic feats and unusual images! This update will add 28 new levels and a bonus boss level to the game. You'll meet heroes and heroines, as well as villains who are out to cause trouble! Connect your intuition and pass all the new levels!

In Heroes and Villains Pack, kitties will try on unusual costumes and masks, show their unique abilities and save us from villainous antics! Get inspired and get aesthetic pleasure from each new superhero!

Features:

  • 28 new levels

  • New boss-level

  • New music

  • New Steam-achievements

  • The game is suitable for kids and adults

  • Unique images for kitties

Meet the new addition for Cast Cats, which will immerse you in the atmosphere of heroic feats and unusual images! This update will add 28 new levels and a bonus boss level to the game. You'll meet heroes and heroines, as well as villains who are out to cause trouble! Connect your intuition and pass all the new levels!

In Heroes and Villains Pack, kitties will try on unusual costumes and masks, show their unique abilities and save us from villainous antics! Get inspired and get aesthetic pleasure from each new superhero!

name: Cast Cats - Heroes and Villains Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The cat universe needs superheroes too! Otherwise, who will save us from the dangerous villains that will get in our way?!
